import React, { useState } from "react"; import chatbotImg from "../images/chatbot.png"; import userimage from "../images/dp.jpg"; function Chatbot() { const messages = ["hello there I am fine"]; const [chatbot, setChatbot] = useState(false); const toggleChatbot = () => { setChatbot(!chatbot); }; return ( <>

); } export default Chatbot;
